<title level="1" right="Trait">[Samsaran](/Traits.aspx?ID=362)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 310</row>

Samsarans are humanoids whose souls reincarnate into new bodies upon their death.
